name: Driver Skill parking - Bus city 3D
description:
Do you like to drive something bigger? Car parking is easy, try the big bus parking. Smooth controls, realistic vehicle physics and challenging parking missions.
Driver Skill parking - Bus city 3D is a 3D simulation where Your aim is to reach the parking spot, but beware - if you touch any cones, you will fail the test.
Features
3D Graphics and Environment
Realistic parking lots
Real vehicle physics
Realistic 3 Metro buses to park
